price: 103. Jie kalbės labai žemais balsais vienas su kitu (sakydami): „Tu nepasilikai ilgiau nei dešimt (dienų).“
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
